actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1538.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include the Banks for Cooperatives among the other financial institutions subject to the provisions of Subsection 582(c) and Section 595(a) of such code.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1538) Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the general rules for banks which stipulate that sales of debt instruments are not sales of capital assets, shall also apply to banks for farm cooperatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include the Banks for Cooperatives among the other financial institutions subject to the provisions of Subsection 582(c) and Section 595(a) of such code.
